node_1: best feature film on national integration
edge: Received award for Best Feature Film on National Integration at the National Film Awards ceremony on August 24, 2023.
Won award for Best Supporting Actress at the National Film Awards ceremony on August 24, 2023.
Nominated for Best Film at the Filmfare Awards ceremony on April 27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Director at the Filmfare Awards ceremony on April 27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Actor at the IIFA Awards ceremony held on May 26-27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Story at the IIFA Awards ceremony held on May 26-27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Screenplay at the Filmfare Awards ceremony on April 27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Editing at the Filmfare Awards ceremony on April 27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Actor at the IIFA Awards ceremony held on May 26-27, 2023.
Nominated for Best Supporting Actor at the Filmfare Awards ceremony on April 27, 2023.
